description: Developed RESTful APIs using FastAPI to support a real-time analytics platform.
Optimized database queries, reducing response time by 30%.
Implemented unit and integration tests, improving code coverage to 90%.
Designed and trained a recommender system for personalized e-commerce product suggestions using PyTorch.
Deployed models on AWS Sagemaker, reducing inference time by 40%.
Built a feature pipeline for real-time data preprocessing with Apache Kafka.
Contributed to the development of a microservices architecture for a high-scale fintech application.
Integrated third-party APIs for payment processing, increasing system reliability.
Collaborated with the DevOps team to establish CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.
Conducted exploratory data analysis on large retail datasets, identifying trends to improve sales forecasting accuracy by 15%.
Developed an anomaly detection model using scikit-learn to flag irregular transactions.
Visualized data insights with Tableau to assist business decision-making.

projects.name: TaskFlow: Workflow Automation Tool
description: Built a full-stack application to automate recurring tasks with dynamic scheduling.
Frontend built with React; backend implemented in Django REST framework.
Implemented OAuth-based authentication and integrated Stripe for payments.
